name: Meowy Christmas 2
description:
Dear customer,

Thank you for choosing our Tabby Lake Christmas Holiday package! We wish you an amazing stay in our luxurious accomodation. Please note that you will have to manually switch on the power before you can take the key to the front door. Once inside, feel free to decorate and rearrange the space as much as you'd like. There are several decorations present in the house. You also selected the premium Christmas meal special, meaning that a delicious Christmas dinner is waiting for you in the fridge. Enjoy!

We wish you a pleasant stay and happy holidays!

Kind Regards,

Sam Whisker

Tabby Lake Parcs

P.S: We've had several reports of stray cats roaming the grounds. They will come inside if you open any windows, so beware!

How to play:

--WASD--

Move around

--Mouse--

Look around

--E--

Interact with object (once crosshair is yellow)

--Escape--

Pause/Settings

--Scroll up and down--

Cycle through your inventory. The text in the bottom of the screen indicates what you are currently holding
